text-node.description: use this start node for cyber source credit card authorization

key-binding.alias: dw.system.Logger.error('An error occured during PaymentAuthoriztion check. (ReasonCode: {0} , RequestID: {1}',ReasonCode,RequestID)

decision-node.description: The request is missing one or more required fields or request contains invalid data
General system failure or request time out
There is a problem with your CyberSource merchant configuration.
The fraud score exceeds your threshold or the order is rejected by Decision Manager.
The order is marked for review by Decision Manager.

text-node.description: Only handles a single shipment. Customer must override this behavior to handle multiple shipments per Order.

key-binding.alias: dw.system.Logger.error('An error occured during PayerAuthValidation check. (ReasonCode: {0} , RequestID: {1}',PAVReasonCode,PAVRequestID)
dw.system.Logger.error('PAXID {0} does not equal PAVXID {1} , possible attempt to hijack session.',PAXID,PAVXID)
dw.system.Logger.error('An error occured during PayerAuthEnroll check. (ReasonCode: {0} , RequestID: {1}',PAReasonCode,PARequestID)

text-node.description: Miscellanous address verfication issues. Customer needs to update information and re-submit
Service Time-out, Server Time-out or General Error
Commit Transaction here as it cannot be rolled back over interaction continue nodes
Give the HandleDAVResponse a chance to log any information, even though it was ignored
Handle AVS failures or "warnings". Mark for review or decline, if appropriate.
Unknown or undocumented api error ReasonCode

decision-node.description: The request is missing one or more required fields or request contains invalid data
General system failure or request time out
PayPal rejected the transaction. or General decline by PayPal.
There is a problem with your CyberSource merchant configuration.
PayPal rejected the transaction. A successful transaction was already completed for this paypalToken value.
Your call to payPalEcDoPaymentService failed. CyberSource successfully set up the order with PayPal, but the authorization functionality failed.
The fraud score exceeds your threshold or the order is rejected by Decision Manager.
The order is marked for review by Decision Manager.

text-node.description: ReasonCode = 999 is set when cybersource request timesout.
